system.description:
This spell allows the caster to return a deceased character to life by magically creating a new body for their life force to inhabit. The spell requires at least a small part of the dead character's body to work.

Effects:

  • The new body may not be the same race as the original. The DM may choose or roll on the provided tables.
  • If reincarnated as a different race, the character loses all racial abilities of the former body and gains those of the new form.
  • If reincarnated as a monster, the monster must be semi-intelligent (at least) and must be able to have the character's original alignment.
  • Class Restrictions: If a non-human character is reincarnated as a human, the DM may allow them to choose a new class. If an elf, dwarf, or halfling is reincarnated into another race, they follow the racial limitations.
